channel.title: [PI] Firemaking help!
channel.description: Trying to improve/add Firemaking. Here's the issue: I added Firemaking. - Added to ItemonItem. - Added to Client.java - But when I light the logs.. "You attempt to light the logs" And it does the anim and whatnot, like it's suppose to. Once done, I guess it lights but the fire doesn't show (don't got a problem with that tbh.) But then after it stands back up you don't lose the logs and when you use the tinderbox on the logs again it says "Please wait till the logs have been lit." So obviously it's still trying to light? O.o...

item.title: [PI] Firemaking help!
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Trying to improve/add Firemaking.
Here’s the issue:
I added Firemaking.

  • Added to ItemonItem.
  • Added to Client.java
  • But when I light the logs…
    “You attempt to light the logs”
    And it does the anim and whatnot, like it’s suppose to.
    Once done, I guess it lights but the fire doesn’t show (don’t got a problem with that tbh.)
    But then after it stands back up you don’t lose the logs and when you use the tinderbox on the logs again it says “Please wait till the logs have been lit.” So obviously it’s still trying to light? O.o…

Read full topic
